# Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[7th Level Druid Spells|Druid 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half (harmless); see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless); see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 263

This spell functions like *[[Cure Light Wounds, Mass (Spell)|mass cure light wounds]]*, except that it cures 2d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +30).
